mapper.select: select no as no, title as title, contents as contents, createId as createId, createDt as createDt, updateId as updateId, updateDt as updateDt from sample where no = #{no}
mapper.insert: insert into sample (title, contents, createId, createDt, updateId, updateDt) values (#{title}, #{contents}, #{createId}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(), #{updateId}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP())
mapper.update: update sample set title=#{title}, contents=#{contents}, updateId=#{updateId}, updateDt=CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() where no = #{no}
